thread.title: Multiple suspicious fires in New Brighton, Christchurch
thread.title_full: Multiple suspicious fires in New Brighton, Christchurch

author: Jack Fletcher
title: Multiple suspicious fires in New Brighton, Christchurch
text:
Multiple suspicious fires in New Brighton, Christchurch JACK FLETCHER Last updated 20:28, February 14 2017 Derek Flynn/Fairfax NZ 
Fire crews are battling two suspicious fires in New Brighton. (file photo) 
Two suspicious fires are burning in Christchurch, further stretching a busy Fire Service. 
Fire Service spokesman Riwai Grace said seven crews were called to the scrub fires, one in the sand dunes on Marine Pde opposite Lonsdale St in New Brighton and one on Anzac Dr near Carisbrooke St. 
"Both fires are being treated as suspicious," Grace said. 
"We want to send a really clear message to people that if anyone sees anything suspicious please ring 111 immediately. 
"This kind of thing is clearly not ideal with everything else that's going on right now." 
Volunteer brigades from New Brighton and Sumner were battling the scrub fires, as well as crews from Christchurch city station.
